name: basement-key
effect: Used by trainer outside of battle : Opens the door to the basement tunnel under goldenrod city.
short_effect: HS: Key to the tunnel under Goldenrod City. Gen III: Key to New Mauville.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: The key for NEW MAUVILLE beneath MAUVILLE CITY.
flavor_text.emerald: The key for NEW MAUVILLE beneath MAUVILLE CITY.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: The key to NEW MAUVILLE, which was constructed beneath MAUVILLE CITY.
